metadata.title: CVE-2018-11503 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
The isfootnote function in markdown.c in libmarkdown.a in DISCOUNT 2.2.3aallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based bufferover-read) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by mkd2html.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

discount - 2.2.4-1
libmarkdown2 - 2.2.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: discount package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.4-1').
